==Descriptions==
{{Description|This valley was formed by the erosion caused by the great river Ardravi that cuts through Sumeru. One who follows the river's flow can reach the southern shore.<br />Though it is Sumeru's great waterborne mercantile route, the care of the [[Forest Watchers]] maintains the purity of natural life in the area, and many lovely creatures dwell there.|[[Expedition]] description}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Ardravi''|sa=आर्द्रावी}} is part of the Iranian goddess {{w|Anahita}}'s name in Sanskrit, Ārdrāvī Śūrā Anāhitā, which means "of the waters, mighty, and immaculate."
